actions.text: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to pursuant to H. Res. 645.
Amendment reported by the House Committee on Rules.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment reported by the House Committee on Rules.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to pursuant to H. Res. 645.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to pursuant to H. Res. 645.

purpose: An amendment printed in Part C of House Report 108-497 and considered as adopted pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 645. The amendment corrects a drafting error which resulted in the bill mistakenly being reported with an incorrect short title in section 1. Clarifies the short title of the Act shall be the `Occupational Safety and Health Small Employer Access to Justice Act of 2004'.
